properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK B WHERE CATEGORY_ID IN(SELECT C.CATEGORY_ID FROM B_CATEGORY C JOIN B_CATEGORY D ON(C.REF_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID) WHERE C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR D.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK B JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND CATEGORY_ID IN(SELECT C.CATEGORY_ID FROM B_CATEGORY C JOIN B_CATEGORY D ON(C.REF_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID) WHERE C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR D.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , AUTHOR , EDITOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , SALE_PRICE , BOOK_IMG , STAR_SCORE , AVG_SCORE FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID)) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , USER_NO , AUTHOR , EDITOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , PRICE , STOCK , SALE_RATE , SALE_PRICE , BOOK_INTRO , BOOK_URL , FILE_PATH , AUTHOR_INTRO , BOOK_IMG , STAR_SCORE , AVG_SCORE , SUM_SCORE FROM BOOK JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) WHERE BOOK_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_NO) FROM B_REVIEW WHERE REF_NO IS NULL AND STATUS = 'Y' AND BOOK_ID = ?

SELECT REVIEW_NO , BOOK_ID , USER_NO , USER_ID , CREATE_DATE , CONTENT , RATING , REF_NO , STATUS FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO , BOOK_ID , USER_NO , USER_ID , CREATE_DATE , CONTENT , RATING , REF_NO , R.STATUS FROM B_REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE BOOK_ID = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) START WITH REF_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR REVIEW_NO = REF_NO
INSERT INTO B_REVIEW( REVIEW_NO , BOOK_ID , USER_NO , CREATE_DATE , CONTENT , RATING , REF_NO , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , NULL , 'Y' )
UPDATE BOOK SET SUM_SCORE = SUM_SCORE + ? , AVG_SCORE = ? , STAR_SCORE = ? WHERE BOOK_ID = ?
UPDATE B_REVIEW SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
UPDATE B_REVIEW SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_NO = ?
INSERT INTO B_REVIEW( REVIEW_NO , BOOK_ID , USER_NO , CREATE_DATE , CONTENT , REF_NO , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , 'Y' )
SELECT CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME FROM B_CATEGORY WHERE REF_ID = 1
SELECT CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME FROM B_CATEGORY WHERE REF_ID = 2

INSERT INTO BOOK ( BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , CATEGORY_ID , USER_NO , AUTHOR , EDITOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , PRICE , STOCK , SALE_RATE , SALE_PRICE , BOOK_INTRO , BOOK_URL , BOOK_IMG , FILE_PATH , AUTHOR_INTRO , STAR_SCORE , AVG_SCORE , SUM_SCORE ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOOK_ID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , NULL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 1 , 0 , ? , ? , ? , CONCAT('/resources/images/book/', ?) , CONCAT('/resources/images/detailBook/', ?) , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
SELECT BOOK_ID , STOCK FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_ID = ?
SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , STOCK FROM BOOK ORDER BY BOOK_NAME ASC
UPDATE BOOK SET STOCK = STOCK + ? WHERE BOOK_ID = ?
